sentences.en: A much greater structural risk occurs in temperate and tropical areas.
sentences.cn: 在温带和热带地区会出现更大的结构风险.
阿佛烈在吃方面是有节制的.

sentences.en: Although these vegetables adapt well to our temperate climate, they tend to crop poorly.
sentences.cn: 虽然这些蔬菜作物很适应我们这里温和的气候，它们的收成却很差。

sentences.en: Fires of natural origin have historically been extremely common throughout the temperate forests.
sentences.cn: 在温带森林中,天然发生的火灾一向是非常普遍的.

sentences.en: Great Britain has a temperate climate.
He is temperate in food and drink.
He spoke in a temperate manner, not favoring either side especially.
sentences.cn: 他说话态度中庸, 并不特别偏袒任何一方.

sentences.en: His final report to the President was far more temperate and balanced than the earlier memorandum.
sentences.cn: 和之前的备忘录相比，他递交给总统的总结报告措辞要更为温和得体。

sentences.en: I love the temperate climate here.
sentences.cn: 我喜欢这儿温和的气候.

sentences.en: In temperate regions more than one - year - old often survive better than one - year - old plants.
sentences.cn: 在温带地区一年以上的嫁接植株通常比一年生的成活率高.

sentences.en: Most of the world's wheat is grown in the North Temperate zone.
sentences.cn: 世界上大部分小麦种植在北温带.

sentences.en: Temperate forest ecosystems occupy a position of prominence among all ecosystems.
sentences.cn: 温带森林生态系统在所有生态系统中占有优势地位.

sentences.en: The Nile Valley keeps a temperate climate throughout the year.
sentences.cn: 尼罗河流域一年四季气候温和。

sentences.en: They thrive only in suitable soil and a temperate climate.
sentences.cn: 茶花这东西有点特性,水壤气候,事事都得细心.

sentences.en: Violets grow wild in most temperate regions of the world.
sentences.cn: 紫罗兰滋生在世界上大多数温和的地方.

words.tran_cn: 缓和的，温和的；调节的；有…气质的
戒酒；节欲；（气候等的）温和

trans.tran_cn: 有节制的，（气候）温和的，适度的
trans.tran_en: behaviour that is temperate is calm and sensible
